Class Servicios

java.lang.Object
edu.uptc.Servicios.Servicios
public class Servicios extends Object
Service class that handles the business logic for the telecommunications company system. Manages users (clients and advisors), plans (mobile and home), and PQRS (Petitions, Complaints, Claims, and Suggestions). This class acts as an intermediary between the controller and the data structures, implementing all CRUD operations and business rules.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Servicios()
    Constructor that initializes all data structures and creates a default admin user.

  • Constructor Details

    • Servicios

      public Servicios()
      Constructor that initializes all data structures and creates a default admin user. The admin user has credentials: ID="0", password="012"

  • Method Details

    • registrarCliente

      public String registrarCliente(String cedula, String nombre, String apellido, LocalDate fechaNacimiento, String pais, String departamento, String ciudad, String numeroCelular, String contrasena) throws ClienteNocreado
      Registers a new client in the system. Validates that all required fields are not null or empty before creating the client.
      Parameters:
      cedula - Client's ID number
      nombre - Client's first name
      apellido - Client's last name
      fechaNacimiento - Client's birth date
      pais - Client's country
      departamento - Client's department/state
      ciudad - Client's city
      numeroCelular - Client's mobile phone number
      contrasena - Client's password
      Returns:
      Success message indicating the client was registered
      Throws:
      ClienteNocreado - if any required field is null or empty

    • registrarAsesor

      public String registrarAsesor(String cedula, String nombre, String apellido, LocalDate fechaNacimiento, String pais, String departamento, String ciudad, String contrasena) throws AsesorNocreado
      Registers a new advisor in the system. Validates that all required fields are not null or empty before creating the advisor.
      Parameters:
      cedula - Advisor's ID number
      nombre - Advisor's first name
      apellido - Advisor's last name
      fechaNacimiento - Advisor's birth date
      pais - Advisor's country
      departamento - Advisor's department/state
      ciudad - Advisor's city
      contrasena - Advisor's password
      Returns:
      Success message indicating the advisor was registered
      Throws:
      AsesorNocreado - if any required field is null or empty

    • eliminarAsesor

      public String eliminarAsesor(String cedula) throws AsesorNocreado
      Removes an advisor from the system. An advisor can only be deleted if they have no managed requests.
      Parameters:
      cedula - The ID of the advisor to be deleted
      Returns:
      Success message or information message if deletion is not possible
      Throws:
      AsesorNocreado - if the advisor is not found

    • obtenerAsesores

      public String obtenerAsesores()
      Retrieves all advisors registered in the system.
      Returns:
      String of StringBuilder that containing all Asesor objects

    • buscarPorIdUsuarios

      public Usuario buscarPorIdUsuarios(String id)
      Searches for a user by their ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The user's ID (cedula)
      Returns:
      The Usuario object if found, null otherwise

    • login

      public String login(String id, String contrasena) throws ContrasenaVacia
      Authenticates a user and determines their role.
      Parameters:
      id - User's ID (cedula)
      contrasena - User's password
      Returns:
      String indicating the user type: "ADMIN", "ASESOR", or "CLIENTE"
      Throws:
      ContrasenaVacia - if credentials are incorrect or user not found

    • registrarPlanMovil

      public String registrarPlanMovil(String idCliente, int minutos, double gigas, double valorServicio, double descuento) throws UsuarioNoencontrado, MinutosGigasnegativos
      Registers a mobile plan for a specific client. The plan is immediately added to the client's list of contracted plans.
      Parameters:
      idCliente - Client's ID
      minutos - Number of minutes included in the plan
      gigas - Amount of data in gigabytes
      valorServicio - Base service value
      descuento - Discount percentage to be applied
      Returns:
      Success message
      Throws:
      UsuarioNoencontrado - if the client is not found
      MinutosGigasnegativos - if minutes or gigas are less than or equal to 0

    • registrarPlanHogar

      public String registrarPlanHogar(String idCliente, String tipoTV, int megasInternet, double valorServicio, double descuento) throws UsuarioNoencontrado, MegasNegativas, TipoTVincorrectos
      Registers a home plan for a specific client. The plan is immediately added to the client's list of contracted plans.
      Parameters:
      idCliente - Client's ID
      tipoTV - Type of TV service ("digital" or "analoga")
      megasInternet - Internet speed in megabytes
      valorServicio - Base service value
      descuento - Discount percentage to be applied
      Returns:
      Success message
      Throws:
      UsuarioNoencontrado - if the client is not found
      MegasNegativas - if internet megas are less than or equal to 0
      TipoTVincorrectos - if TV type is not "digital" or "analoga"

    • registrarPQRS

      public String registrarPQRS(String idCliente, int tipo, String descripcion, int idPlan) throws UsuarioNoencontrado, NoExistePlan
      Registers a new PQRS (Petition, Complaint, Claim, or Suggestion) for a client. The PQRS must be associated with an existing plan owned by the client.
      Parameters:
      idCliente - Client's ID
      tipo - Type of PQRS: 1=Petition, 2=Complaint, 3=Claim, 4=Suggestion
      descripcion - Description of the PQRS
      idPlan - ID of the plan associated with this PQRS
      Returns:
      Success message
      Throws:
      UsuarioNoencontrado - if the client is not found
      NoExistePlan - if the plan is not found

    • obtenerTodasPQRSAsesor

      public String obtenerTodasPQRSAsesor(String idAsesor) throws UsuarioNoencontrado
      Retrieves all PQRS managed by a specific advisor.
      Parameters:
      idAsesor - Advisor's ID
      Returns:
      String containing the formatted list of managed PQRS
      Throws:
      UsuarioNoencontrado - if the advisor is not found

    • obtenerPQRSCliente

      public String obtenerPQRSCliente(String idCliente) throws UsuarioNoencontrado
      Retrieves all PQRS submitted by a specific client.
      Parameters:
      idCliente - Client's ID
      Returns:
      String containing the formatted list of client's PQRS
      Throws:
      UsuarioNoencontrado - if the client is not found

    • obtenerTodosPQRS

      public String obtenerTodosPQRS() throws PQRSNoEncontrada
      Retrieves all PQRS registered in the system with detailed information. Includes specific fields for each PQRS type (Petition, Complaint, Claim, Suggestion).
      Returns:
      String containing all PQRS with their details
      Throws:
      PQRSNoEncontrada - if there are no PQRS registered

    • obtenerPlanesCliente

      public String obtenerPlanesCliente(String idCliente) throws UsuarioNoencontrado
      Retrieves all plans contracted by a specific client with their monthly payment details.
      Parameters:
      idCliente - Client's ID
      Returns:
      String containing all client's plans and total monthly payment
      Throws:
      UsuarioNoencontrado - if the client is not found

    • solucionarPQRS

      public String solucionarPQRS(String idAsesor, int idPQRS, String solucion, int nivelesAux) throws UsuarioNoencontrado, PQRSNoEncontrada
      Resolves a PQRS by an advisor. Different actions are taken based on the PQRS type: - Petition: marks as resolved and adds solution concept - Complaint: sets dissatisfaction level and marks as reviewed - Claim: adds compensation resource and marks as resolved - Suggestion: sets importance level
      Parameters:
      idAsesor - Advisor's ID who is resolving the PQRS
      idPQRS - PQRS ID to be resolved
      solucion - Solution text (used for Petitions and Claims)
      nivelesAux - Auxiliary level value (used for Complaints and Suggestions)
      Returns:
      Success message
      Throws:
      UsuarioNoencontrado - if the advisor is not found
      PQRSNoEncontrada - if the PQRS is not found

    • modificarPQRS

      public String modificarPQRS(String idCliente, int idPQRS, String nuevaDescripcion) throws UsuarioNoencontrado, PQRSNoEncontrada
      Modifies the description of an existing PQRS. Only the client who owns the PQRS can modify it.
      Parameters:
      idCliente - Client's ID
      idPQRS - PQRS ID to be modified
      nuevaDescripcion - New description for the PQRS
      Returns:
      Success message
      Throws:
      UsuarioNoencontrado - if the client is not found
      PQRSNoEncontrada - if the PQRS is not found or doesn't belong to the client

    • eliminarPQRSCliente

      public String eliminarPQRSCliente(int idPQRS, String idUsuario) throws PQRSNoEncontrada
      Deletes a PQRS from both the client's list and the system's global list. Only the client who owns the PQRS can delete it.
      Parameters:
      idPQRS - PQRS ID to be deleted
      idUsuario - Client's ID who owns the PQRS
      Returns:
      Success message
      Throws:
      PQRSNoEncontrada - if the PQRS is not found or client is not found

    • crearPlanMovilAdmin

      public String crearPlanMovilAdmin(int minutos, double gigas, double valorServicio, double descuento) throws MinutosGigasnegativos
      Creates a new mobile plan template available for clients to contract. This is an admin function to populate the catalog of available plans.
      Parameters:
      minutos - Number of minutes in the plan
      gigas - Amount of data in gigabytes
      valorServicio - Base service value
      descuento - Discount percentage
      Returns:
      Success message
      Throws:
      MinutosGigasnegativos - if minutes or gigas are less than or equal to 0

    • crearPlanHogarAdmin

      public String crearPlanHogarAdmin(String tipoTV, int megasInternet, double valorServicio, double descuento) throws MegasNegativas, TipoTVincorrectos
      Creates a new home plan template available for clients to contract. This is an admin function to populate the catalog of available plans.
      Parameters:
      tipoTV - Type of TV service ("digital" or "anloga")
      megasInternet - Internet speed in megabytes
      valorServicio - Base service value
      descuento - Discount percentage
      Returns:
      Success message
      Throws:
      MegasNegativas - if internet megas are less than or equal to 0
      TipoTVincorrectos - if TV type is invalid

    • obtenerPlanesMovilesDisponibles

      public String obtenerPlanesMovilesDisponibles()
      Retrieves all available mobile plans with their details and monthly payment.
      Returns:
      Formatted string containing all available mobile plans

    • obtenerPlanesHogarDisponibles

      public String obtenerPlanesHogarDisponibles()
      Retrieves all available home plans with their details and monthly payment.
      Returns:
      Formatted string containing all available home plans

    • seleccionarPlanDisponible

      public String seleccionarPlanDisponible(String idCliente, int idPlan) throws UsuarioNoencontrado
      Allows a client to select and contract an available plan from the catalog. Creates a copy of the selected plan and adds it to the client's plans. The plan is searched first in mobile plans, then in home plans.
      Parameters:
      idCliente - Client's ID
      idPlan - ID of the plan to be contracted
      Returns:
      Success message or error if plan not found
      Throws:
      UsuarioNoencontrado - if the client is not found

    • solicitarPlanPersonalizado

      public String solicitarPlanPersonalizado(String idCliente, String descripcion) throws UsuarioNoencontrado
      Allows a client to request a customized plan. Creates a petition-type PQRS with the plan description and associates it with a temporary plan. This request will be reviewed by an advisor.
      Parameters:
      idCliente - Client's ID who is requesting the customized plan
      descripcion - Description of the desired customized plan
      Returns:
      Success message
      Throws:
      UsuarioNoencontrado - if the client is not found

    • calcularPagoMensualPlan

      public double calcularPagoMensualPlan(int idPlan)
      Calculates the monthly payment for a specific plan. Searches for the plan in both available mobile and home plan catalogs.
      Parameters:
      idPlan - ID of the plan to calculate payment for
      Returns:
      The monthly payment amount, or 0 if plan is not found

    • obtenerUsuarioActual

      public Usuario obtenerUsuarioActual(String idCliente)
      Retrieves the current logged-in user by their ID. This method is used to maintain the user session in the GUI.
      Parameters:
      idCliente - The user's ID (cedula)
      Returns:
      The Usuario object corresponding to the given ID
